title: Gere faults Trump for blurring meaning of 'refugee' and 'terrorist'
text: RocketNews nominated for a Webby Award About Us: Rocketnews is an aggregator of the top online news articles and stories from around the globe. Rocketnews uses news feeds from a variety on online news feed providers including Feedzilla, Yahoo, and the BBC. Addition news feed providers included online media suppliers, local and regional publications, industry journals, companies, governments, universities, PR companies, official organizations, associations, shopping guides and weblogs. Featured content providers include Reuters, Metacafe, News Corporation, About, BBC and The Sun.
